citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1200 on
11-May-17.Upon arrival I spoke with the licensee who was not able to be home in a time to conduct the inspection
process.
This is the first attempted inspection.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1200 on
11-May-17.Upon arrival I spoke with the licensee who was not able to be home in a time to conduct the inspection
process. 
This is the first attempted inspection.
